attributes.action: PLEASE PREVENT THE JEREMY KYLE SHOW FROM AIRING FOOTAGE ON 18TH JUNE 2007 GLORIFYING A PAEDOPHILE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SIR, IT IS WITH DISGUST THAT TODAY I HAVE READ IN THE NEWS OF THE WORLD NEWSPAPER THAT JEREMY KYLE SHOW WILL GIVE AIRTIME TO A PAEDOPHILE TO AIR HIS VIEWS AND OPINIONS AS TO WHY HE SEXUALLY ABUSED CHILDREN, SIR AS A FAMILY MAN AND A VICTIM OF CHILD ABUSE I FEEL THAT THIS IS AN INSULT TO ANYBODY AFFECTED BY THESE TYPE OF PEOPLE AND UNDERMINES THE WORK OUR SOCIETY AND YOUR GOVERNMENT ARE DOING TO RID THE WORLD OF SUCH ATROCITIES, I BELEIVE THAT JEREMY KYLE AND ITV OUGHT TO PREVENT THIS KIND OF ACTION, ITV SHOULD ALSO BE PUNISHED FOR SUCH INTENTION, PLEASE PRIME MINISTER IT IS WITHOUT DOUBT THAT SUCH AIR TIME WOULD BE BETTER SPENT PORTRAYING HELP TO VICTIMS OF CHILD ABUSE NOT THE PERPETRATORS.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
